comment.author: 55961052@N00
comment._content: If that is Herschel Evans the date cannot be 1941, but 1939 at the latest, for Evans died February 2 of that year.

comment.author: 51986335@N02
comment._content: Great catch, Dill Pixels -- we'll make a note of this and change the description when we next update our databases.

comment.author: 55961052@N00
comment._content: OK! Say hello to Pat Padua, if he's at all in your neighborhood.
